query:
SELECT 
  c.code as country_code,
  c.name as country_name,
  COUNT(*) as total_services,
  SUM(CASE WHEN p.active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active_services,
  SUM(CASE WHEN p.active = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as inactive_services
FROM prices p
JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
GROUP BY c.code, c.name
ORDER BY total_services DESC
LIMIT 10;

  COUNT(*) as total_services,
  SUM(CASE WHEN p.active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active_services,
  SUM(CASE WHEN p.active = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as inactive_services
FROM prices p
JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
GROUP BY c.code, c.name
